columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image.

columns.name: appstream_agent_version
columns.description: The version of the AppStream 2.0 agent to use for instances that are launched from this image.

columns.name: base_image_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the image from which this image was created.

columns.name: created_time
columns.description: The time the image was created.

columns.name: image_builder_name
columns.description: The name of the image builder that was used to create the private image. If the image is shared, this value is null.

columns.name: image_builder_supported
columns.description: Indicates whether an image builder can be launched from this image.

columns.name: platform
columns.description: The operating system platform of the image.

columns.name: public_base_image_released_date
columns.description: The release date of the public base image. For private images, this date is the release date of the base image from which the image was created.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The image starts in the PENDING state. If image creation succeeds, the state is AVAILABLE. If image creation fails, the state is FAILED.

columns.name: visibility
columns.description: Indicates whether the image is public or private.

columns.name: applications
columns.description: The applications associated with the image.

columns.name: image_errors
columns.description: Describes the errors that are returned when a new image can't be created.

columns.name: image_permissions
columns.description: The permissions to provide to the destination AWS account for the specified image.

columns.name: state_change_reason
columns.description: The reason why the last state change occurred.
